title: Peace - Volume 3
description: Peace - Vol.3 - A collection of 10 unique ambient music backgrounds
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


Peace - Volume 3 is the third collection of 10 unique ambient music backgrounds with an intimate, soft and positive mood, ideal for your games related to meditation, exploration, space calling, aerials and many more categories.

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements. 

The package includes multiple loops, edit versions for all your editing needs.


  • Brushing Memories Full length (02:21), 8 Loops, 3 Edits
  • Celestial Serenade Full length (05:01), 14 Loops, 3 Edits, 
  • Curly Clouds Full length (01:58), 7 Loops, 2 Edits
  • Dwarf Planet Full length (02:23), 12 Loops, 2 Edits
  • Emerald Tides Full length (03:42), 9 Loops, 3 Edits
  • Lullaby In Space Full length (02:39), 7 Loops, 3 Edits
  • Painted Angels Full length (04:20), 8 Loops, 3 Edits
  • Seas And Skies Full length (02:24), 8 Loops, 2 Edits
  • Sleeping Seagulls Full length (02:21), 14 Loops, 3 Edits
  • Waves Of Serenity Full length (03:17), 13 Loops, 4 Edits


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at the other "Peace" collections:

  • Peace Vol. 1 - Peace Vol.2

﻿
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Full length tracks: 10
  •  Loops: 100
  •  Edits: 28


Number of Audio Wavs: 138

Number of Audio Cues: 138

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 1h, 58m, 29s

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


﻿- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
